Singapore for Foodies - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Singapore for Foodies Singapore’s celebrated food scene makes it a bucket list destination for travellers and food enthusiasts. Sample authentic flavours from across Asia and take in the rich variety of culinary delights on offer. From Michelin star recognition to the legendary street food, it's easy to see why Singapore is an absolute favourite city for the foodies among us. Deal Details Travel Dates 1 Feb 2026 - 31 May 2026 Sale Ends Nov 16, 2025 Priced From $719 Enquire Now Singapore’s celebrated food scene makes it a bucket list destination for travellers and food enthusiasts. Sample authentic flavours from across Asia and take in the rich variety of culinary delights on offer. From Michelin star recognition to the legendary street food, it's easy to see why Singapore is an absolute favourite city for the foodies among us. Accommodation Vibe Hotel Singapore Orchard + Gourmet Singaporean Street Food Private Tour (4 stars) Vibe Hotel Singapore Orchard, located in the residential enclave of Orchard Road, offers a trendy and convenient stay. With contemporary design, modern rooms, and an outdoor pool, it provides a stylish urban escape. The hotel's prime location ensures easy access to shopping, dining, and entertainment options, making it an ideal choice for a vibrant Singapore experience. Gourmet Singaporean Street Food Private Tour - Embark on a culinary adventure through Singapore's Chinatown, where traditional hawker stalls meet modern bars. Indulge in a full course street food experience including the main course at a Michelin rated stall. Rooms Superior Room (3 nights) 07 Feb - 24 Mar 26 Stay price: $719.00 Includes: Breakfast Daily & Gourmet Singaporean Street Food Private Tour Note: Airfares are additional. Blackout dates apply. 17 Feb-02 Mar 26. Features 3 nights accommodation Inclusions as specified Note: Pricing is per person, twin or double share Airfares are additional Quincy Hotel Singapore + Little India Walking Tour (4 stars) Quincy Hotel Singapore is a chic, adults-only boutique retreat located near vibrant Orchard Road, steps from premier shopping, dining, and entertainment. This luxurious haven offers stylish guest rooms including premium amenities and complimentary Wi Fi. Guests enjoy an all-day lounge with refreshments, extended à la carte breakfast, evening cocktails, and soft serve ice cream. Unwind in the infinity pool, sauna, steam room, and well-equipped gym ideal for a sophisticated escape. Little India Walking Tour - Explore Little India, a vibrant and diverse neighbourhood and enjoy its food and culture with a visit to the Tekka Centre a lively market with a spice shop and delicious Indian snacks. Stop to make a flower garland by hand then vist a nearby ancient Hindu temple and make an offering with your garland. Rooms Deluxe Room (3 nights) 01 Feb - 31 May 26 Stay price: $1,059.00 Includes: Breakfast Daily & Little India Walking Tour Note: Quincy Hotel Caters to Adults only a minumum age of 13 years applies. Airfares are additional. Features 3 nights accommodation Inclusions as specified Note: Pricing is per person, twin or double share Airfares are additional PARKROYAL on Beach Road Singapore + Local Flavours Half Day Tour (4 stars) Parkroyal on Beach Road, Singapore, is a stylish hotel in the vibrant Kampong Glam district. Offering modern rooms, a rooftop pool, and the award-winning St. Gregory Spa, it provides a relaxing retreat. Guests enjoy easy access to Bugis MRT, Arab Street, and Suntec City. The hotel also features Halal-certified dining at Ginger and a well-equipped gym for fitness enthusiasts. Local Flavours Half Day Tour - Discover the backstreets of Chinatown on this authentic guided walking tour. Visit traditional wet markets and local coffee shops where you can sample Singaporean delicacies and get the opportunity to engage with local shopkeepers and immerse yourself in the vibrant and diverse food scene. Rooms Deluxe Room (3 nights) 25 Feb - 31 May 26 Stay price: $1,355.00 Includes: Breakfast Daily & Local Flavours Half Day Tour Note: Airfares are additional. Features 3 nights accommodation Inclusions as specified Note: Pricing is per person, twin or double share Airfares are additional Terms & Conditions Terms & Conditions: Prices are correct as at 30 September 2025 and are subject to availability & change without notice. Sales period: Valid for sale from 06 October 2025 until 16 November 2025 unless otherwise stated, withdrawn or sold out prior. General conditions: Airfares & Transfers are additional. Room rates are dynamic providing the best rate of the day dependent on current inventory as such these are subject to availability & change without notice. All prices are per person & in NZ Dollars. All prices are based on payment by cash or EFTPOS only. Airfares & holiday packages include airline, operational costs, pre-payable taxes & airport charges unless otherwise stated. Additional levies, government charges & other applicable fees may apply & are beyond our control. Minimum & maximum stay restrictions may apply. Selected deals are based on restricted flight schedules, hotel check in/out time & are ultimately the responsibility of the passengers upon booking to ensure flight schedules & hotel check in/out time are suitable for their needs.Seasonal surcharges & blackout dates may apply depending on date of travel. Stopovers & alternative routes may incur additional costs. Prices are valid for new bookings only. Accommodation, holiday packages, cruises & tours are based on twin share, unless otherwise stated. Holidays are based on consecutive night stays. The accommodation, cruises, airfares, coach & small group tours & any other components included are provided by carriers & hoteliers with their own terms & conditions, which your booking is subject to.For full terms & conditions visit www.infinityholidays.co.nz/conditions Experience the world differently.
